original: jeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Atha vā naritabbo netabboti naro. So hi jātakālato

original: Sutte vuttā atthā pakārehi ñāpīyanti iminā, ettha vāti paññatti, ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāralakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso paññatti hāro.

original: Suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsu otarīyanti anuppavesīyanti ettha, etena vāti otaraṇo, paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otaraṇo hāro.

original: ca atthi, te vuttappakārā vicayamānā pucchādayo yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena viciyanti,

original: Pucchīyate pucchitaṃ. Vissajjīyate vissajjitanti bhāvasādhanattho daṭṭhabbo, na kammasādhanattho. Tena vuttaṃ ṭīkāyaṃ “bhāvatthe toti āha – ‘vissajjitanti vissajjanā”’ti.
analyzed: pucchīyate pucchitam vissajjīyate vissajjitanti bhāva sādhana tthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ na kamma sādhana tthaḥ tena vuttam ṭīkā ayam bhāva tthe āha vissajjitam ti vissajjanā ti

original: “Suttassā”ti niyamitattā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ na gahetabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. So vicayo hāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttova. Kathaṃ? –
analyzed: suttassa ati niyamita ttā saṃvaṇṇanā vasena aṭṭhakathāyam āgatam na gahetabbanti daṭṭhabbam saḥ vicayaḥ hāraḥ aṭṭhakathāyam vuttaḥ iva katham

original: “Ayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā

analyzed: atīta visayā anāgata visayā paccuppanna visayā ati ādinā pucchā vicayaḥ veditabbaḥ idam

original: Tattha indriyakhandhāti indriyāni ca khandhā cāti indriyakhandhā. Dhātuāyatanāti dhātuyo ca āyatanāni ca dhātuāyatanā. Kathaṃ otaraṇo? “Uddhaṃ adho sabbadhi vippamutto”tiādi pāṭho.
analyzed: tattha indriya khandhā ati indriyāni ca khandhāḥ ca ati indriya khandhāḥ dhātu āyatanā ati dhātuyaḥ ca āyatanāni ca dhātu āyatanā katham otaraṇaḥ uddham adhas sabbadhi vippamuttaḥ iti ādi pāṭhaḥ

original: Uddhanti rūpadhātu ca arūpadhātu ca. Adhoti kāmadhātu. Sabbadhi vippamuttoti tedhātuke ayaṃ asekkhāvimutti. Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni, ayaṃ indriyehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: rūpadhātu ca arūpadhātu ca adhoti kāmadhātu sabbadhi vippamuttoti tedhātuke ayam asekkhā vimutti tāniyeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni ayam indriyehi otaraṇā

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni vijjā, vijjuppādā avijjānirodho…pe… dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti, ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: tāni yeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni vijjā vijjuppādā dukkha kkhandhassa nirodho hoti ayam paṭiccasamuppādehi otaraṇā

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena, ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇā.
analyzed: tāni yeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni sīla kkhandhena samādhi kkhandhena paññā kkhandhena ayam khandhehi otaraṇā

original: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā anāsavā, no ca bhavaṅgā, te saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā, ayaṃ dhātūhi otaraṇā.
analyzed: tāni yeva asekkhāni pañca indriyāni saṅkhāra pariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārāḥ anāsavāḥ no ca bhavaṅgā te saṅkhārāḥ dhammadhātu saṅgahitāḥ dhātūhi otaraṇā

original: Sā dhammadhātu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā, yaṃ āyatanaṃ anāsavaṃ, no ca bhavaṅgaṃ, ayaṃ āyatanehi otaraṇāti evamādīhi vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
analyzed: sā dhammadhātu dhamma āyatana pariyāpannā yam āyatanam anāsavam no ca bhavaṅgam ayam āyatanehi evamādīhi vibhaṅge āgamissati iti

original: Otaraṇahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo sodhanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
analyzed: otaraṇa hāra niddeso niddiṭṭhaḥ amhehi ca ñāto katamo sodhana hāra niddeso ti pucchitabbattā

original: “Vissajjitamhi pañhe, gāthāyaṃ pucchitā yamārabbha.
analyzed: vissajjitamhi pañhe gāthā ayam pucchitā yam ārabbha

original: Suddhāsuddhaparikkhā, hāro so sodhano nāmā”ti. –
analyzed: suddha asuddha parikkhā hāro so sodhanaḥ nāma ati

original: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ āruḷhe pañhe ñātumicchite atthe bhagavatā vissajjanagāthāyaṃ
analyzed: gāthā vuttā tattha tissam gāthāyaṃ āruḷhe pañhe ñātum icchite atthe bhagavatā vissajjana gāthāyaṃ

original: vissajjitamhi yaṃ suttatthaṃ ārabbha adhikicca sā gāthā pucchitā pucchanatthāya ṭhapitā,
analyzed: vissajjitamhi yam sutta attham ārabbha adhikicca sā gāthā pucchitā pucchana tthāya ṭhapitā

original: tassa suttatthassa yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena suddhāsuddhaparikkhā vicāraṇā bhave, so
analyzed: tassa sutta tthassa yena saṃvaṇṇanā visesena suddha asuddha parikkhā vicāraṇā bhave saḥ

original: saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sodhano hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇanā visesaḥ sodhanaḥ hāraḥ nāma ati attha yojanā

original: Kathaṃ? “Avijjāya nivuto loko”ti padaṃ sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Vivicchā pamādā
analyzed: katham padam sodhitam ārambhaḥ na sodhitaḥ

original: nappakāsatī”ti padaṃ sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Jappābhilepanaṃ brūmī”ti padaṃ
analyzed: nappakāsati iti padam sodhitam ārambhaḥ na sodhitaḥ jappa abhilepanam brūmi iti padam

original: sodhitaṃ, ārambho na sodhito. “Dukkhamassa mahabbhaya”nti padañca sodhitaṃ, ārambho
analyzed: sodhitam ārambhaḥ na sodhitaḥ dukkham assa mahabbhayanti padam ca sodhitam ārambhaḥ

original: ca sodhitoti. Evaṃ padādīnaṃ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro hāro sodhano nāma. Vitthārato
analyzed: ca evam sodhita iti evam sodhita asodhita bhāva vicāraḥ hāraḥ sodhanaḥ nāma vitthārato

original: pana vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
analyzed: pana vibhaṅge āgamissati iti

original: Sodhanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
analyzed: sodhana hāra niddeso niddiṭṭhaḥ amhehi ca ñāto katamaḥ adhiṭṭhāna hāra niddeso ti pucchitabbattā

original: “Ekattatāya dhammā, yepi ca vemattatāya niddiṭṭhā.
analyzed: ekatta tāya dhammāḥ ye pi ca vematta tāya niddiṭṭhā

original: Te na vikappayitabbā, eso hāro adhiṭṭhāno”ti. –
analyzed: te na vikappayitabbāḥ esaḥ hāraḥ adhiṭṭhāno ti

original: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ye dukkhasaccādayo dhammā ekattatāya sāmaññenapi ca vemattatāya
analyzed: gāthā vuttā tattha ye dukkha sacca ādayaḥ dhammāḥ ekatta tāya sāmaññena api ca vematta tāya

original: visesenapi niddiṭṭhā, yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena niddiṭṭhā dukkhasaccādayo dhammā na
analyzed: visesena api niddiṭṭhāḥ yena saṃvaṇṇanā visesena niddiṭṭhāḥ dukkha sacca ādayaḥ dhammāḥ na

original: vikappayitabbā sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato, kāladisāvisesādīnaṃ
analyzed: vikappayitabbā sāmañña visesa kappanāya vohāra bhāvena anavaṭṭhānato kāla disā visesa ādīnam

original: viya apekkhāsiddhito ca, eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso adhiṭṭhāno hāroti atthayojanā.
analyzed: viya apekkhā siddhito ca eso saṃvaṇṇanā viseso adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāro ti attha yojanā

original: Tattha ekattatāyāti ekassa samānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ, ekattameva ekattatā, tāya. Ekasaddo
analyzed: tattha ekatta tāya ati ekassa samānassa bhāvaḥ ekattam ekattam eva ekatta tā tāya eka saddaḥ

original: cettha samānatthavācako, na saṅkhyāvācakoti. Vemattatāyāti visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā,
analyzed: ca ittha samāna attha vācakaḥ na saṅkhyā vācakaḥ iti vemattatāya ati visiṭṭhā mattā vimattā

original: vimattā eva vemattaṃ, vemattassa bhāvo vemattatā, tāya. Yathā hi “ajja sve”ti vuccamānā
analyzed: vimattāḥ eva vemattam vemattassa bhāvaḥ vematta tā tāya yathā hi ajja sva iti vuccamānā

original: kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitā bhavanti, “purimā disā, pacchimā disā”ti vuccamānā disāvisesā,
analyzed: kāla visesāḥ anavaṭṭhitāḥ bhavanti purimā disā pacchimā disā iti vuccamānā disā avisesā

original: evaṃ sāmaññavisesā ca atthassa sabhāvāti. Tathā hi “idaṃ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṃ jātiādiṃ
analyzed: evam sāmañña visesā ca atthassa sabhāvā ti tathā hi idam dukkhan ti vuccamānam jāti ādim

original: apekkhāya sāmaññaṃ samānampi saccāpekkhāya viseso hoti. Esa nayo samudayasaccādīsupīti.
analyzed: apekkhāya sāmaññam samānam pi sacca apekkhāya viseso hoti esa nayo samudaya sacca ādīsu pi iti

original: “Dukkha”nti ekattatā. “Jāti dukkhā, jarā dukkhā, maraṇaṃ dukkha”nti evamādi vemattatā.
analyzed: dukkhanti ekatta tā jāti dukkhā jarā dukkhā maraṇam dukkhanti evamādi vematta tā

original: evamādi vitthāro vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
analyzed: evamādi vitthāraḥ vibhaṅge āgamissati iti

original: Adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo parikkhārahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna hāra niddeso niddiṭṭhaḥ amhehi ca ñāto katamo parikkhāra hāra niddeso ti pucchitabbattā

original: “Ye dhammā yaṃ dhammaṃ, janayantippaccayā paramparato.
analyzed: ye dhammā yam dhammam janayanti paccayā paramparataḥ

original: Hetumavakaḍḍhayitvā, eso hāro parikkhāro”ti. –
analyzed: hetum avakaḍḍhayitvā eso hāro parikkhāro ti

original: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha avijjādikā ye paccayadhammā saṅkhārādikaṃ yaṃ phaladhammaṃ paccayā
analyzed: gāthā vuttā tattha avijjā ādikā ye paccaya dhammā saṅkhāra ādikam yam phala dhammam paccayā

original: sahajātapaccayena paramparato paramparapaccayabhāvena janayanti, tassa saṅkhārādiphalassa

analyzed: sādhāraṇam paccaya hetuñca avakaḍḍhayitvā suttataḥ niddhāretvā yaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā viseso

analyzed: parikkhāra saṃvaṇṇanā bhāvena pavatto eso saṃvaṇṇanā viseso parikkhāro hāraḥ nāma ati

original: atthayojanā. Avijjādayo hi avijjādīnaṃ asādhāraṇahetū bhavanti, ayonisomanasikārādayo

original: “avijjā avijjāya hetu, ayonisomanasikāro paccayo”tiādikaṃ vibhaṅgavacanañca.

original: Parikkhārahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo samāropanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
analyzed: parikkhāra hāra niddeso niddiṭṭhaḥ amhehi ca ñāto katamo samāropana hāra niddeso ti pucchitabbattā

original: “Ye dhammā yaṃmūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā.
analyzed: ye dhammāḥ yaṃmūlāḥ ye cekatthā pakāsitāḥ muninā

original: Te samāropayitabbā, esa samāropano hāro”ti. –
analyzed: te samāropayitabbā esa samāropanaḥ hāro ti

original: Gāthā vuttā. Tattha ye sīlādayo dhammā yaṃmūlā yesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ mūlā, te sīlādayo
analyzed: gāthā vuttā tattha ye sīla ādayaḥ dhammāḥ yaṃmūlāḥ yesam samādhi ādīnam te sīla ādayaḥ

original: Soḷasahāraniddesavibhāvanā niṭṭhitā.
Nayaniddesavibhāvanā
17. Hāraniddesā niddiṭṭhā, amhehi ca ñātā, “katame nayaniddesā”ti pucchitabbattā
analyzed: hāra niddesā niddiṭṭhāḥ amhehi ca ñātā katame naya niddesā ti pucchitabba ttā

original: Padapucchāvissajjanāpucchāpadānugītīhi saddhiṃ desanāhārapadatthānaṃ assādādīnaṃ pavicayabhāvato desanāhārānantaraṃ vicayo hāro.

original: Vicayahārena pavicitānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇabhāvato vicayahārānantaraṃ yutti hāro.

original: Padaṭṭhānahārassa yuttāyuttānaṃyeva atthānaṃ upapattianurūpaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya niddhāraṇattā yuttihārānantaraṃ padaṭṭhānahāro.

original: Yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ avuttānampi samānalakkhaṇatāya gahaṇalakkhaṇattāya padaṭṭhānahārānantaraṃ lakkhaṇahāro.

analyzed: dassitaḥ pamādaḥ āvaṭṭito ti

original: Parivattanahārena paṭipakkhato parivattitāpi dhammā pariyāyavacanehi bodhetabbā, na saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte āgatadhammāyevāti dassanatthaṃ parivattanahārānantaraṃ vevacanahāro.

original: Vevacanahārena pariyāyato pakāsitānaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhedato paññattivasena vibhajanaṃ sukhena sakkā ñātunti vevacanahārānantaraṃ paññatti hāro.

original: Paññattihārena pabhavapariññādipaññattivibhāgamukhena paṭiccasamuppādasaccādidhammavibhāge

original: “Avijjāya nivuto loko, (ajitāti bhagavā,)
analyzed: avijjāya nivutaḥ lokaḥ bhagavā

original: Vivicchā pamādā nappakāsati;
analyzed: vivicchā pamādā na ppakāsati

original: Jappābhilepanaṃ brūmi, dukkhamassa mahabbhaya”nti. –
analyzed: jappa abhilepanam brūmi dukkham assa mahat bhayanti

original: Ayaṃ gāthā vissajjanāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha avijjāya nivuto lokoti kāḷapakkhacatuddasī,
analyzed: ayam gāthā vissajjanā ti daṭṭhabbā tattha avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti kāḷa pakkha catuddasī

original: ghanavanasaṇḍa, meghapaṭalacchādana, aḍḍharattīnaṃ vasena caturaṅgasamannāgatena
analyzed: vasena catur aṅga samannāgatena

original: andhakārena rathaghaṭādi paṭicchādito viya dhammasabhāvapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya avijjāya
analyzed: andhakārena ratha ghaṭa ādi paṭicchāditaḥ viya dhamma sabhāva paṭicchādana lakkhaṇāya avijjāya

original: sattaloko nivuto paṭicchādito. “Ajitā”ti ca ālapanaṃ katvā bhagavā āha. Vivicchāti
analyzed: satta lokaḥ paṭicchāditaḥ ajitā ati ca ālapanam katvā bhagavā āha viviccha ati

original: vicikicchāya pamādahetu yathāvuttaloko nappakāsati. Jappaṃ taṇhaṃ yathāvuttalokassa
analyzed: vicikicchāya pamāda hetu yathāvutta lokaḥ na ppakāsati jappam taṇham yathāvutta lokassa

original: “abhilepana”nti ahaṃ brūmīti bhagavā āha, dukkhaṃ jātiādivaṭṭadukkhaṃ assa yathāvuttalokassa
analyzed: abhilepananti aham brūmi iti bhagavā āha dukkham jāti ādi vaṭṭa dukkham assa yathāvutta lokassa

original: “mahabbhaya”nti ahaṃ brūmīti bhagavā ajitaṃ āhāti attho.
analyzed: aham brūmi iti bhagavā ajitam āha ati atthaḥ

original: “Imāya vissajjanāya kathaṃ vicineyyā”ti pucchitabbattā “imāni cattāri padānī”tiādi
analyzed: imāya vissajjanāya katham vicineyya ati pucchitabba ttā imāni cattāri padāni itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha imāni cattāri padānīti “kenassu nivuto loko”tiādipucchāgāthāyaṃ vuttāni
analyzed: vuttam tattha imāni cattāri padāni iti lokaḥ iti ādi pucchā gāthāyam vuttāni

original: gāthāpadāni. Imehi catūhi padehīti “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti vissajjanāgāthāyaṃ vuttehi
analyzed: gāthā padāni imehi catūhi padehi iti avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti vissajjanā gāthāyam vuttehi

original: gāthāpadehi vissajjitāni. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ padaṃ paṭhamena padena, dutiyaṃ padaṃ
analyzed: gāthā padehi vissajjitāni katham paṭhamam padam paṭhamena padena dutiyam padam

original: dutiyena padena, tatiyaṃ padaṃ tatiyena padena, catutthaṃ padaṃ catutthena padena vissajjitaṃ.

original: “Kenassu nivuto loko”ti paṭhamapañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti paṭhamā vissajjanā
analyzed: kenassu nivutaḥ loko ti paṭhama pañhe avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti paṭhamā vissajjanā

original: katā, na uppaṭipāṭiyā. Vijjāya paṭipakkhā avijjā, tasmā avijjāya ajānako loko bhaveyya.
analyzed: katā naḥ uppaṭipāṭiyā vijjāya paṭipakkhā avijjā tasmai avijjāya a jānakaḥ lokaḥ bhaveyya

original: Kathaṃ nivuto saddahitabboti āha “nīvaraṇehi nivuto loko”ti. Yadi evaṃ “nīvaraṇena
analyzed: katham nivutaḥ saddahitabbo ti āha nīvaraṇehi nivutaḥ loko ti yadi evam nīvaraṇena

original: nivuto loko”ti vissajjanā kātabbāti codanaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “avijjānīvaraṇā hi
analyzed: nivutaḥ lokaḥ iti vissajjanā kātabbā ati codanam manasi katvā vuttam avijjā nīvaraṇā hi

original: sabbe sattā”ti. “Sabbasattānaṃ avijjānīvaraṇabhāvo kena vacanena saddahitabbo”ti
analyzed: sabbe sattā ati sabba sattānam avijjā nīvaraṇa bhāvaḥ kena vacanena saddahitabbaḥ iti

analyzed: vattabba ttā yathā āha bhagavā itiādi vuttam

original: “Sabbasattānaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbapāṇānaṃ sabbabhūtānaṃ, pariyāyato ekameva nīvaraṇaṃ
analyzed: sabba sattānam bhikkhave sabba pāṇānam sabba bhūtānam pariyāyataḥ ekam eva nīvaraṇam

original: vadāmi, yadidaṃ avijjā. Avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā. Sabbasova bhikkhave avijjāya
analyzed: vadāmi yat idam avijjā avijjā nīvaraṇāḥ hi sabbe sattā sabbaso va bhikkhave avijjāya

analyzed: nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā natthi sattānam nīvaraṇan ti vadāmi iti yam vacanam yathā

original: yena pakārena bhagavā āha, tathā tena pakārena vuttena tena vacanena tumhehi sabbasattānaṃ
analyzed: yena pakārena bhagavā āha tathā tena pakārena vuttena tena vacanena tumhehi sabba sattānam

original: avijjānīvaraṇabhāvo saddahitabboti.
analyzed: avijjā nīvaraṇa bhāvo saddahitabbo ti

analyzed: na siyā kenassu nappakāsati iti dutiya padassa api vissajjanā siyāti codanam manasi

original: katvā “tena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tena “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti padena “kenassu
analyzed: katvā tena ca ati ādi vuttam tattha tena avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti padena

original: nivuto loko”ti paṭhamassa padassa vissajjanā yuttā yuttatarā hoti, yuttatarattā “kenassu
analyzed: nivutaḥ loko ti paṭhamassa padassa vissajjanā yuttā yuttatarā hoti yuttatarattā kenassu

original: nivuto loko”ti pañhe “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti vissajjanāti mayā vattabbāyevāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: nivutaḥ lokoti pañhe avijjāya nivutaḥ lokoti vissajjana ati mayā vattabbāya eva ati adhippāyaḥ

original: “Kenassu nappakāsatī”ti imasmiṃ pañhe “vivicchā pamādā nappakāsatī”ti ayaṃ vissajjanā
analyzed: nappakāsati iti imasmin pañhe vivicchā pamādā nappakāsati iti ayam vissajjanā

analyzed: nivutaḥ lokaḥ na ppakāsati iti vissajjanā kātabbā katham vivicchā pamādā lokaḥ na ppakāsati iti

analyzed: vissajjanā katā ati vattabbattā yaḥ puggalaḥ tiādi vuttam tattha yaḥ puthujjana bhūto

analyzed: puggalaḥ so puthujjana bhūtaḥ puggalaḥ vivicchāya vivicchati

original: “Yāya vivicchāya vivicchati, sā vivicchā katamā nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā “vivicchā
analyzed: yāya vivicchāya vivicchati sā vivicchā katamā nāma ati pucchitabbattā vivicchā

original: nāma vuccati vicikicchā”ti vuttaṃ. “Tāya kasmā nappakāsatī”ti vattabbattā “so vicikicchanto”tiādi
analyzed: nāma vuccati vicikicchā ati vuttam tāya kasmā nappakāsati iti vattabbattā saḥ vicikicchantaḥ itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tāya vicikicchanto so puthujjanabhūto puggalo saddahitabbesu nābhisaddahati;
analyzed: vuttam tāya vicikicchantaḥ saḥ puthujjana bhūtaḥ puggalaḥ saddahitabbesu na abhisaddahati

original: saddahitabbesu na abhisaddahanto akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ

original: viharatīti, pamādena viharanto pamatto puggalo sukke dhamme na uppādiyati; anuppādayantassa
analyzed: viharati iti pamādena viharantaḥ pamattaḥ puggalo sukke dhamme na uppādiyati an uppādayantassa

original: na pavattanti; tasmā “vivicchā pamādā loko nappakāsatī”ti vissajjanā kātabbāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: na pavattanti tasmai vivicchā pamādāḥ lokaḥ na ppakāsati iti vissajjanā kātabbā ati adhippāyaḥ

original: “Tādisassa sukkadhammānaṃ appakāsanabhāvo amhehi kena vacanena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “yathāha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha –
analyzed: tādisassa sukka dhammānaṃ appakāsana bhāvaḥ amhehi kena vacanena saddahitabbaḥ iti vattabba bhāvataḥ yathā āha bhagavā itiādi vuttam tattha

original: “Dūre santo pakāsanti, himavantova pabbato;
analyzed: dūre santaḥ pakāsanti himavantaḥ iva pabbato

original: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā;
analyzed: asantā ittha na dissanti rattim khittā yathā sarā

original: Te guṇehi pakāsanti, kittiyā ca yasena cā”ti. –
analyzed: te guṇehi pakāsanti kittiyā ca yasena ca ati

original: Yaṃ gāthāpāṭhaṃ bhagavā yathā yena appakāsanākārena āha, tathā tena appakāsanākārena
analyzed: yam gāthā pāṭham bhagavā yathā yena appakāsanā ākārena āha tathā tena appakāsanā ākārena

analyzed: vuttena tena gāthā pāṭhena tādisassa puggalassa sukka dhammānaṃ appakāsana bhāvaḥ tumhehi

analyzed: saddahitabbaḥ yā eva tasmai vivicchā pamādā lokaḥ na ppakāsati iti vissajjanā adhippāyo

original: Gāthāttho pana – himavanto pabbato dūre ṭhito dūre ṭhitānampi sacakkhukānaṃ puggalānaṃ
analyzed: gāthā atthaḥ pana himavanto pabbataḥ dūre ṭhitaḥ dūre ṭhitānam pi sa cakkhukānam puggalānam

analyzed: pakāsati iva evam santo sappurisāḥ dūre ṭhitānam pi guṇa vasena pavattāya kittiyā ca

original: guṇavasena pavattehi yasaparibhogaparivārehi ca dūre ṭhitānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ pakāsanti,
analyzed: guṇa vasena pavattehi yasa paribhoga parivārehi ca dūre ṭhitānam paṇḍitānam pakāsanti

analyzed: ratti kāle khittā sarā usū na dissanti yathā ettha satta loke viviccha apamādānam vasena

original: viharanto asanto na dissanti. Ye santo pakāsanti, te santo guṇehi pakāsantīti dassetuṃ
analyzed: viharantaḥ asantaḥ na dissanti ye santaḥ pakāsanti te santaḥ guṇehi pakāsanti iti dassetum

original: “te guṇehi pakāsantī”ti vuttaṃ. Guṇā nāma abbhantare jātā, “kathaṃ guṇehi pakāsantī”ti
analyzed: te guṇehi pakāsanti iti vuttam guṇāḥ nāma abbhantare jātā katham guṇehi pakāsanti iti

original: vattabbattā “kittiyā ca yasena cā”ti vuttaṃ. Guṇānubhāvena pavattāya kittiyā ca guṇānubhāvena
analyzed: vattabbattā kittiyā ca yasena ca ati vuttam guṇa anubhāvena pavattāya kittiyā ca guṇa anubhāvena

original: pavattena yasena ca pakāsantā puggalā guṇehi pakāsantīti vattabbāvāti.
analyzed: pavattena yasena ca pakāsantā puggalāḥ guṇehi pakāsanti iti

analyzed: yadi viviccha apamādānam vasena na ppakāsati evam sati lokaḥ nivutaḥ hoti tasmā paṭhamassa

original: padassāpi vissajjanā kātabbāti codanaṃ manasi katvā “tena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: padassa api vissajjanā kātabbā ati codanam manasi katvā tena ca atiādi vuttam tattha

analyzed: vissajjanā yuttā yuttatarā ati attho padena ati ca padattha ṭṭhena vissajjanā ati attho

original: Padassāti padatthassa pucchitabbassāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Esa nayo heṭṭhā, upari ca.
analyzed: padassa ati padatthassa pucchitabbassa ati atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ esa nayaḥ heṭṭhā upari ca

original: “Kissābhilepanaṃ brūsī”ti pañhe “jappābhilepanaṃ brūmī”ti vissajjanā tassā ajitena

analyzed: daṭṭhabbā katamā jappā nāma ati pucchitabba ttā jappā nāma vuccati taṇhā ati vuttam

original: Sā taṇhā lokaṃ abhilimpatīti kathaṃ viññāyatīti yojanā. Tena vuttaṃ “yathāha bhagavā”tiādi.
analyzed: sā taṇhā lokam abhilimpati iti katham viññāyati iti yojanā tena vuttam yathā āha bhagavā itiādi

original: Tattha yathā yena taṇhāya abhilepanabhāvena –

original: “Ratto atthaṃ na jānāti, ratto dhammaṃ na passati;
analyzed: rattaḥ attham na jānāti rattaḥ dhammam na passati

original: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ rāgo sahate nara”nti. –

original: Gāthāyaṃ pana – rajjati sattoti ratto, rāgasamaṅgīsatto. Kāraṇaṃ paṭicca asati pavattati

original: andhaṃ. Yanti yamhi kāle. Yanti hi bhummatthe paccattavacanaṃ. Yamhi kāle rāgo naraṃ

original: Rāgo naraṃ yaṃ yasmā sahate, tasmā andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hotīti vā, rāgo yaṃ naraṃ sahate,
analyzed: rāgaḥ naram yam yasmai sahate tasmai andham tamam tadā hoti iti vā rāgaḥ yam naram sahate

original: sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ nipphādeti, taṃ sahanaṃ abhibhavanaṃ andhaṃ andhakāraṃ tamaṃ hotīti vā yojanā.
analyzed: sahanam abhibhavanam tam sahanam abhibhavanam andham andhakāram tamam hoti iti vā yojanā

original: “Yadi ratto atthādikaṃ na jānāti, evaṃ sati kathaṃ jappābhilepanaṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā

analyzed: puggalassa sā ayam taṇhā evam bahu āsaṅga vasena abhijappā pariyuṭṭhāna ṭṭhāyinī hoti

analyzed: iti karitvā iminā kāraṇena tattha taṇhāya satta lokaḥ kenaci silesena abhilittaḥ makkhito

original: viya jappābhilepena abhilitto nāma bhavatīti yojanā. “Jappābhilepanaṃ appakāsanassapi
analyzed: viya jappa abhilepena abhilittaḥ nāma bhavati iti yojanā jappa abhilepanam appakāsanassa api

analyzed: kāraṇam bhavati tasmā na ppakāsati iti dutiya padatthassa api vissajjanā siyāti

original: vattabbattā “tena cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vattabba ttā tena ca atiādi vuttam

original: “Tassa lokassa mahabbhayaṃ ki”nti imasmiṃ catutthapañhe “assa lokassa dukkhaṃ mahabbhayaṃ
analyzed: tassa lokassa mahat bhayam kinti imasmin catuttha pañhe assa lokassa dukkham mahat bhayam

analyzed: bhayam mahat bhayam katividham dukkhanti pucchitabba ttā duvidham dukkhanti ādi

original: vuttaṃ. Dve vidhā assa dukkhassāti duvidhaṃ. “Katamaṃ duvidhaṃ dukkha”nti pucchitabbattā

original: ca tadubhayañca chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ
analyzed: ca tat ubhayañca chanda samādhi ppadhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam viveka nissitam virāga nissitam

original: nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti yojanā.
analyzed: nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmim iddhipādam bhāveti iti yojanā

original: Chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatanti chando eva adhipati chandādhipati, chandādhipatisamādhi.
analyzed: chanda eva adhipati chanda adhipati chanda adhipati samādhi

original: Tena vuttaṃ bhagavatā – “chandaṃ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati
analyzed: tena vuttam bhagavatā chandam ce bhikkhave bhikkhu adhipatim karitvā labhati

original: samādhi”nti. Chandahetuko vā samādhi, chandādiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi, chandādhipatissa
analyzed: samādhinti chanda hetukaḥ vā samādhi chanda ādikaḥ vā samādhi chanda samādhi chanda adhipatissa

original: paccayuppanno samādhīti vuttaṃ hoti. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā, padhānasaddena
analyzed: paccaya uppanno samādhi iti vuttam hoti padhāna bhūtā saṅkhārā padhāna saṅkhārā padhāna saddena

original: saṅkhatasaṅkhārādayo nivattāpitā, chandasamādhi ca padhānasaṅkhārā cāti chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārā,
analyzed: chanda samādhi ca padhāna saṅkhārā ca ati chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhārā

original: tehi samannāgato chanda…pe… samannāgato, taṃ…pe… gataṃ. Ijjhati samijjhati nippajjatīti
analyzed: tehi samannāgataḥ chandape samannāgataḥ taṃpe gatam ijjhati samijjhati nippajjati iti

original: iddhi, koṭṭhāso, iddhi eva pādo koṭṭhāsoti iddhipādo, iddhipādacatuttho. Ijjhanti
analyzed: iddhi koṭṭhāso iddhi eva pādo koṭṭhāso ti iddhi pādo iddhi pāda catuttho

original: vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi, pajjati etenāti pādo, iddhiyā
analyzed: vā tāya sattāḥ iddhāḥ vuddhāḥ ukkaṃsa gatāḥ honti iti iddhi pajjati etena ati pādaḥ iddhiyā

original: pādoti iddhipādo. Iddhipādoti sāmaññatthavasena vuttopi “chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgata”nti
analyzed: pādo ti iddhipādo iddhipādo ti sāmaññattha vasena vuttaḥ api chanda samādhi ppadhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatanti

original: vuttattā chandiddhipādova gahetabbo, taṃ iddhipādaṃ taṃ chandiddhipādaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti attho.
analyzed: vutta ttā chanda iddhipādaḥ uva gahetabbaḥ tam iddhipādam tam chanda iddhipādam bhāveti vaḍḍheti iti attho

original: Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitanti vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato
analyzed: viveka nissitam virāga nissitanti vipassanā kkhaṇe kiccataḥ tad aṅga viveka nissitam ajjhāsayato

analyzed: nissaraṇa viveka nissitam virāga nissitam ti vipassanā kkhaṇe kiccato tad aṅga virāga nissitam

analyzed: ajjhāsayataḥ nissaraṇa viveka nissitam magga kkhaṇe pana kiccataḥ samuccheda virāga nissitam

original: ārammaṇato nissaraṇavirāganissitaṃ. Nirodhanissitanti vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅganirodhanissitaṃ,
analyzed: ārammaṇataḥ nissaraṇa virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam ti vipassanā kkhaṇe kiccato tad aṅga nirodha nissitam

analyzed: ajjhāsayataḥ nissaraṇa nirodha nissitam magga kkhaṇe kiccataḥ samuccheda nirodha nissitam

analyzed: pakkhandana vossaggaḥ magga kkhaṇe samuccheda vasena pariccāga vossaggaḥ ārammaṇa karaṇena

analyzed: nibbāna pakkhandana vossaggaḥ ti vibhajitvā gahetabbaḥ yathā vutta vossagga attham pariṇamati

original: pariṇataṃ vā paripacati paripacanaṃ karotīti vossaggapariṇāmī, taṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
analyzed: pariṇatam vā paripacati paripacanam karoti iti vossagga pariṇāmī tam vossagga pariṇāmim

original: Chandiddhipādabhāvanākāro ācariyena vutto, amhehi ca ñāto, “kathaṃ vīriyiddhipādabhāvanākāro
analyzed: chanda iddhipāda bhāvanā ākāraḥ ācariyena vuttaḥ amhehi ca ñātaḥ katham vīriya iddhipāda bhāvanā ākāraḥ

original: amhehi vijānitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāreneva viññeyyo. Saṃkhittavasena pana ṭhapitaṃ pāṭhaṃ vitthārato

original: ṭhapessāmi. Kathaṃ? –
analyzed: ṭhapessāmi katham

original: “Tattha yā vīriyādhipateyyā cittekaggatā, ayaṃ vīriyasamādhi. Samāhite citte kilesānaṃ
analyzed: tattha yā vīriya ādhipateyyā citta ekagga tā ayam vīriya samādhi samāhite citte kilesānaṃ

original: vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṃ pahānaṃ. Tattha ye

original: vikkhambhanatāya paṭisaṅkhānabalena vā bhāvanābalena vā, idaṃ pahānaṃ. Tattha ye
analyzed: vikkhambhana tāya paṭisaṅkhāna balena vā bhāvanā balena vā idam pahānam tattha ye

analyzed: iddhipādam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmiṃ

analyzed: vikkhambhana tāya paṭisaṅkhāna balena vā bhāvanā balena vā idam pahānam tattha ye

original: assāsapassāsā vitakkavicārā saññāvedayitā sarasaṅkappā, ime saṅkhārā. Iti purimako

analyzed: iddhipādam bhāveti viveka nissitam virāga nissitam nirodha nissitam vossagga pariṇāmin ti

analyzed: sampayutto pubbabhāge pavatto samādhi vā vīriya samādhi citta samādhi iti cittam jeṭṭhakam

analyzed: tattha sabbo samādhi iti chanda samādhi vīriya samādhi citta samādhi vīmaṃsā samādhi iti

original: catubbidho samādhi. Ñāṇamūlakoti ekāvajjanavīthinānāvajjanavīthīsu pavattaṃ upacārañāṇamūlako.

analyzed: paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇam anuparivatti assa ati ñāṇa anuparivatti atha vā nānā vajjanūpacāra ñāṇam

original: appanāñāṇaṃ anuparivatti assāti ñāṇānuparivatti. Sabbaṃ vā upacārañāṇaṃ mūlaṃ assāti

original: assāti ñāṇānuparivatti, anuparivattanaṃ vā anuparivatti, ñāṇassa anuparivatti ñāṇānuparivatti,

original: ñāṇānuparivatti assāti ñāṇānuparivatti. Ñāṇaṃ pana pubbe vuttappakārameva.

original: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti yathā chandasamādhiādicatubbidhasamādhissa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇānuparivattibhāvena

analyzed: saṃvaṭṭa vivaṭṭesu attanaḥ khandha paṭibaddhassa paresam khandha paṭibaddhassa ca suṭṭhu

analyzed: paṭivijjhanam eva na duppaṭivijjhananti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo yathā pacchā tathā purā iti

original: tathā tathāvuttasamādhissa pure atītesu sattasuyeva divasesu parasattānaṃyeva cittassa

original: suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanameva, na duppaṭivijjhananti attho.
analyzed: suṭṭhu paṭivijjhanam eva na duppaṭivijjhanan ti attho

original: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā cakkhumantānaṃ sattānaṃ divasabhāge sūriyālokena

original: Yathā rattiṃ tathā divāti yathā rattibhāge caturaṅgasamannāgatepi andhakāre yathāvuttasamādhissa

original: Kammassakataññāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇānugatattā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇadassanaṃ kammassakataññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: kammassakata ññāṇassa pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇa anugata ttā pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇa dassanam kammassakata ññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ

original: Okappanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yassā saddhāyāti okappanalakkhaṇā saddhā. Adhimutti paccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: okappanam lakkhaṇam yassā saddhāya ati okappana lakkhaṇā saddhā adhimutti paccupaṭṭhānam

original: yassā saddhāyāti adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā ca saddhā. Anāvilaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yassa pasādassāti
analyzed: yassa saddhāya ati adhimutti paccupaṭṭhānā ca saddhā anāvilam lakkhaṇam yassa pasādassa ati

original: anāvilalakkhaṇoti pasādo. Sampasīdanaṃ paccupaṭṭhānaṃ yassa pasādassāti sampasīdanapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: anāvila lakkhaṇo ti pasādaḥ sampasīdanam paccupaṭṭhānam yassa pasādassa ati sampasīdana paccupaṭṭhāno

original: ca pasādo. So pana pasādo saddhāya eva avatthāvisesoti veditabbo. Aveccapasādo abhipatthiyanalakkhaṇāya
analyzed: ca pasādo saḥ pana pasādaḥ saddhāya eva avatthā visesaḥ ti veditabbaḥ avecca pasādaḥ abhipatthiyana lakkhaṇāya

original: saddhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ, okappanalakkhaṇā saddhā anāvilalakkhaṇassa pasādassa padaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: saddhāya padaṭṭhānam okappana lakkhaṇā saddhā anāvila lakkhaṇassa pasādassa padaṭṭhānam

original: catubbidhaṃ sammappadhānaṃ vīriyaṃ ārambhalakkhaṇassa vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, kāyādisatipaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: catubbidham sammappadhānam vīriyam ārambha lakkhaṇassa vīriyassa padaṭṭhānam kāya ādi sati paṭṭhānam

original: apilāpanalakkhaṇāya satiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ, jhānasahitassa samādhissa ekaggalakkhaṇattā
analyzed: apilāpana lakkhaṇāya satiyā padaṭṭhānam jhāna sahitassa samādhissa ekagga lakkhaṇa ttā

original: vitakkādijhānāni samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ, paññāya kiccapajānanaārammaṇapajānanalakkhaṇattā
analyzed: vitakka ādi jhānāni samādhissa padaṭṭhānam paññāya kicca pajānana ārammaṇa pajānana lakkhaṇa ttā

original: saccāni paññāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: saccāni paññāya padaṭṭhānam

original: “Yesaṃ avijjādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena vibhattāni, te avijjādayo katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: yesam avijjā ādīnam padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena vibhattāni te avijjā ādayaḥ katamesam dhammānam

original: padaṭṭhānānī”ti pucchitabbattā te avijjādayopi imesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānāti dassetuṃ
analyzed: padaṭṭhānāni iti pucchitabba ttā te avijjā ādayaḥ api imesam dhammānam padaṭṭhānā ti dassetuṃ

original: “aparo nayo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avijjā assādamanasikāralakkhaṇassa ayonisomanasikārassa
analyzed: aparaḥ naya iti ādi vuttam avijjā assāda manasikāra lakkhaṇassa ayoniso manasikārassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Avijjāya hi ādīnavacchādanato ayonisomanasikāro jātoti. Saccasammohanalakkhaṇā
analyzed: pada ṭṭhānam avijjāya hi ādīnava chādanataḥ a yoniso manasikāraḥ jātaḥ ti sacca sammohana lakkhaṇā

original: avijjā puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, punabbhavavirohanalakkhaṇā tebhūmakacetanā
analyzed: avijjā puñña apuñña aneñja abhisaṅkhārānam padaṭṭhānam punabbhava virohana lakkhaṇā tebhūmaka cetanā

original: saṅkhārā vipākaviññāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, opapaccayikasaṅkhātena upapattibhavabhāvena
analyzed: saṅkhārāḥ vipāka viññāṇassa padaṭṭhānam opapaccayika saṅkhātena upapatti bhava bhāvena

original: nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ nāmarūpassa padaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmakāyarūpakāyasaṅghātalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: nibbatti lakkhaṇam paṭisandhi viññāṇam nāma rūpassa padaṭṭhānam nāma kāya rūpa kāya saṅghāta lakkhaṇam

original: nāmarūpaṃ chaḷāyatanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ sahajātādipaccayabhāvato, cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ
analyzed: nāma rūpam chaṭṭhāyatanassa padaṭṭhānam sahajāta ādi paccaya bhāvato cakkha ādīnam channam

original: indriyānaṃ pavattānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ chaḷāyatanaṃ chabbidhassa phassassa yathākkamaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: indriyānam pavattānam lakkhaṇam chaḷāyatanam chabbidhassa phassassa yathākkamam padaṭṭhānam

original: nissayādipaccayabhāvato, cakkhupasādarūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādisannipātalakkhaṇo
analyzed: nissaya ādi paccaya bhāvataḥ cakkhu pasāda rūpa ārammaṇam cakkhu viññāṇa ādi sannipāta lakkhaṇo

original: chabbidho phasso, taṃ vedanāya tena chabbidhena phassena sahajātāya chabbidhāya vedanāya
analyzed: chabbidhaḥ phassaḥ tam vedanāya tena chabbidhena phassena sahajātāya chabbidhāya vedanāya

original: yathākkamaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ sahajātādipaccayabhāvato, iṭṭhānubhavanaaniṭṭhānubhavanaiṭṭhāniṭṭhānubhavanalakkhaṇā
analyzed: yathākkamam padaṭṭhānam sahajāta ādi paccaya bhāvato iṭṭha anubhavana aniṭṭha anubhavana eṭṭha aniṭṭha anubhavana lakkhaṇā

original: tividhā vedanā, taṃ taṇhāya tāya tividhāya vedanāya vasena pavattāya taṇhāya padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tividhā vedanā tam taṇhāya tāya tividhāya vedanāya vasena pavattāya taṇhāya padaṭṭhānam

original: upanissayādipaccayabhāvato, saparasantānesu ajjhosānalakkhaṇā taṇhā, taṃ upādānassa
analyzed: upanissaya ādi paccaya bhāvato sa para santānesu ajjhosāna lakkhaṇā taṇhā tam upādānassa

original: tāya taṇhāya vasena pavattassa catubbidhassa upādānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ upanissayādipaccayabhāvato.
analyzed: tāya taṇhāya vasena pavattassa catubbidhassa upādānassa padaṭṭhānam upanissaya ādi paccaya bhāvato

original: “So vedanāyā”ti ca “sā taṇhāyā”ti ca “sā upādānassā”ti ca pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, liṅgavipallāsaniddeso vā siyā.
analyzed: saḥ vedanāya iti ca sā taṇhāya iti ca sā upādānassa ati ca pāṭhena bhavitabbam liṅga vipallāsa niddesaḥ vā siyā

original: Yaṃ upādānaṃ opapaccayikaṃ upapattikkhandhanibbattakaṃ, taṃ upādānaṃ duvidhassa bhavassa
analyzed: yam upādānam opa paccayikam upapatti kkhandha nibbattakam tam upādānam duvidhassa bhavassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo kammabhavo nāmakāyarūpakāyasambhavanalakkhaṇo, so kammabhavo jātiyā
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam yaḥ kamma bhavaḥ nāma kāya rūpa kāya sambhavana lakkhaṇo so kamma bhavaḥ jātiyā

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yā upapattibhūtā jāti khandhapātubhāvalakkhaṇā, taṃ sā jāti jarāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam yā upapatti bhūtā jāti khandha pātubhāva lakkhaṇā tam sā jāti jarāya padaṭṭhānam

original: Yā jiṇṇajarā upadhikkhandhaparipākalakkhaṇā, taṃ sā jiṇṇajarā maraṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: yā jiṇṇa jarā upadhi khandha paripāka lakkhaṇā tam sā jiṇṇa jarā maraṇassa padaṭṭhānam

original: Yampi yassa sammutimaraṇaṃ jīvitindriyupacchedalakkhaṇaṃ, tampi tassa sammutimaraṇaṃ
analyzed: yam pi yassa sammuti maraṇam jīvitindriya upaccheda lakkhaṇam tam pi tassa sammuti maraṇam

original: sokassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Piyassa maraṇaṃ cintentassa yebhuyyena sokuppajjanato yo soko
analyzed: sokassa padaṭṭhānam piyassa maraṇam cintentassa yebhuyyena soka uppajjanataḥ yo soko

original: ñātiādipiyesu ussukkakārako, taṃ so soko paridevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo paridevo lālappakārako,
analyzed: ñāti ādi piyesu ussukka kārako tam so soko paridevassa padaṭṭhānam yo paridevaḥ lālappa kārako

original: taṃ so paridevo kāyikadukkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyasampīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: tam so paridevaḥ kāyika dukkhassa padaṭṭhānam yat kāyikam dukkham kāya sampīḍana lakkhaṇam

original: taṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ domanassaṃ cittasampīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: tam kāyikam dukkham domanassassa padaṭṭhānam yam domanassam citta sampīḍana lakkhaṇam

original: taṃ domanassaṃ upāyāsassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo upāyāso odahanakārako avadahanakārako,
analyzed: tam domanassam upāyāsassa padaṭṭhānam yaḥ upāyāsaḥ odahana kārako avadahana kārako

original: taṃ so upāyāso bhavassa upāyāsassa nissayasantānabhavassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tam so upāyāsaḥ bhavassa upāyāsassa nissaya santāna bhavassa padaṭṭhānam

original: Bhavassāti vuttabhavaṃ dassetuṃ “imānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha bhavaṅgāni kileso bhavassa
analyzed: bhavassa iti vutta bhavam dassetum imāni itiādi vuttam tattha bhavaṅgāni kilesaḥ bhavassa

original: aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭāni bhavasaṅkhātāni aṅgāni avayavāni. Yadā paccuppannādikāle
analyzed: aṅgam kāraṇam kamma vaṭṭa vipāka vaṭṭāni bhava saṅkhātāni aṅgāni avayavāni yadā paccuppanna ādi kāle

original: samaggāni nibbattāni bhavanti, tadā so kilesavaṭṭakammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭasaṅkhāto dhammasamūho
analyzed: samaggāni nibbattāni bhavanti tadā saḥ kilesa vaṭṭa kamma vaṭṭa vipāka vaṭṭa saṅkhātaḥ dhamma samūhaḥ

original: “bhavassā”ti ettha bhavoti daṭṭhabbo. Taṃ bhavasaṅkhātaṃ kilesavaṭṭakammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭattayaṃ
analyzed: bhavassa ati ettha bhavaḥ ti daṭṭhabbo tam bhava saṅkhātam kilesa vaṭṭa kamma vaṭṭa vipāka vaṭṭa ttayam

original: saṃsārassa padaṭṭhānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ jātinipphannakilesādivaṭṭena saṃsārassa abbocchinnuppajjanato,
analyzed: saṃsārassa padaṭṭhānam purimam purimam jāti nipphanna kilesa ādi vaṭṭena saṃsārassa abbocchinna uppajjanato

original: yo ariyamaggo niyyānikalakkhaṇo, taṃ so ariyamaggo nirodhassa nibbānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ ariya maggo niyyānika lakkhaṇo tam saḥ ariya maggo nirodhassa nibbānassa padaṭṭhānam

original: sampāpakahetubhāvato.
analyzed: sampāpaka hetu bhāvataḥ

original: Bahussuto sabbasissādīnaṃ patiṭṭhānattā titthaṃ viyāti titthaṃ, jānātīti ñū, titthaṃ
analyzed: bahussutaḥ sabba sissa ādīnam patiṭṭhāna ttā tittham viyāti tittham jānāti iti ñū tittham

original: ñūti titthaññū, titthaññuno bhāvo titthaññutā, sammāpayirupāsanā, sā pītaññutāya
analyzed: ñū ti titthaññū titthaññunaḥ bhāvaḥ titthaññu tā sā pītaññu tāya

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Bahussutassa hi sammāpayirupāsanāya dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjaṃ jāyati,
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam bahu ssutassa hi dhamma upasañhitam pāmojjam jāyati

original: pāmojjena ca kammaṭṭhānabrūhanā jāyatīti sappāyadhammassavanena pītiṃ jānātīti pītaññū,
analyzed: pāmojjena ca kammaṭṭhāna brūhanā jāyati iti sappāya dhamma ssavanena pītim jānāti iti pītaññū

original: pītaññuno bhāvo pītaññutā, kammaṭṭhānassa brūhanā, sā pattaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānabrūhanāya
analyzed: pītaññunaḥ bhāvaḥ pītaññu tā kammaṭṭhānassa brūhanā sā pattaññu tāya padaṭṭhānam kammaṭṭhāna brūhanāya

original: hi bhāvanāpattajānanatā jāyatīti pattaññutā. Bhāvanāpattajānanatā attaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: hi bhāvanā patta jānana tā jāyati iti pattaññu tā bhāvanā patta jānana tā attaññu tāya padaṭṭhānam

original: Bhāvanāpattajānanatāya hi pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatassa attano jānanatā jāyatīti
analyzed: bhāvanā patta jānana tāya hi pañcahi padhāniyaṅgehi samannāgatassa attanaḥ jānana tā jāyati iti

original: attaññutā pubbekatapuññatāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: attaññu tā pubbekata puñña tāya padaṭṭhānam

original: Padhāniyaṅgesu samannāgatattajānanatāya hi pubbe puññakaraṇaṃ jātaṃ, pubbekatapuññatā
analyzed: padhāniyaṅgesu samannāgata tta jānana tāya hi pubbe puñña karaṇam jātam pubbekata puñña tā

original: patirūpadesavāsassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Pubbe hi katena puññena patirūpadesavāso laddho,
analyzed: pati rūpa desavāsassa padaṭṭhānam pubbe hi katena puññena pati rūpa desavāsaḥ laddho

original: patirūpadesavāso sappurisūpanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Patirūpadesavāsena hi sappurisūpanissayo
analyzed: patirūpa desavāso sappurisa upanissayassa padaṭṭhānam patirūpa desavāsena hi sappurisa upanissayo

original: laddho, sappurisūpanissayo attasammāpaṇidhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sappurisūpanissayena
analyzed: laddhaḥ sappurisa upanissayaḥ atta sammāpaṇidhānassa padaṭṭhānam sappurisa upanissayena

original: hi attasammāpaṇidhānaṃ jātaṃ, attasammāpaṇidhānaṃ sīlānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Attasammāpaṇidhānena
analyzed: hi atta sammāpaṇidhānam jātam atta sammāpaṇidhānam sīlānam padaṭṭhānam atta sammāpaṇidhānena

original: hi sīlāni sampatiṭṭhitāni, sīlāni avippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Attani hi sampatiṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: hi sīlāni sampatiṭṭhitāni sīlāni a vippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānam attani hi sampatiṭṭhitam

original: sīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa vippaṭisāro natthevāti, avippaṭisārena pāmojjaṃ jāyati, tasmā
analyzed: sīlam paccavekkhantassa vippaṭisāro nattha eva ati a vippaṭisārena pāmojjam jāyati tasmā

original: avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Pāmojjena pīti jāyati, tasmā pāmojjaṃ pītiyā

analyzed: padaṭṭhānam pītiyā passaddhi jāyati tasmā pīti passaddhiyā padaṭṭhānam passaddhiyā

original: sukhaṃ jāyati, tasmā passaddhi sukhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sukhena samādhi jāyati, tasmā

original: sukhaṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Samādhinā yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ jāyati, tasmā samādhi
analyzed: sukham samādhissa padaṭṭhānam samādhinā yathā bhūta ñāṇa dassanam jāyati tasmā samādhi

original: yathābhūtañāṇassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathābhūtañāṇadassanena nibbidāñāṇaṃ jāyati, tasmā
analyzed: yathābhūta ñāṇassa padaṭṭhānam yathābhūta ñāṇa dassanena nibbidā ñāṇam jāyati tasmā

original: yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṃ. Nibbidāya virāgo jāyati, tasmā nibbidā
analyzed: yathā bhūta ñāṇa dassanam nibbidāya padaṭṭhānam nibbidāya virāgaḥ jāyati tasmai nibbidā

original: virāgassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Virāgena vimutti jāyati, tasmā virāgo vimuttiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: virāgassa padaṭṭhānam virāgena vimutti jāyati tasmā virāgaḥ vimuttiyā padaṭṭhānam

original: Vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ jāyati, tasmā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vimuttiyāḥ vimutti ñāṇa dassanam jāyati tasmā vimutti vimutti ñāṇa dassanassa padaṭṭhānaṃ

original: Evaṃ yathāvuttanayena yo koci dhammo upanissayo hoti, yo koci dhammo paccayo hoti,
analyzed: evam yathā vutta nayena yaḥ koci dhammo upanissayaḥ hoti yaḥ koci dhammo paccayaḥ hoti

original: sabbo so dhammo attano paccayuppannassa dhammassa padaṭṭhānanti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sabbaḥ saḥ dhammaḥ attanaḥ paccaya uppannassa dhammassa padaṭṭhānan ti daṭṭhabbo

original: “Upanissayadhammassa, paccayadhammassa vā paccayuppannadhammassa padaṭṭhānabhāvo
analyzed: upanissaya dhammassa paccaya dhammassa vā paccayuppanna dhammassa padaṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ

original: kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tenāti yassa kassaci
analyzed: kena saddahitabbaḥ iti vattabbattā tena āha atiādi vuttam tattha tena ati yassa kassaci

original: upanissayadhammassa, paccayadhammassa ca paccayuppannadhammassa padaṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: upanissaya dhammassa paccaya dhammassa ca paccayuppanna dhammassa padaṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: āyasmā mahākaccāno “dhammaṃ deseti jino”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ āha, tena vacanena tesaṃ
analyzed: āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ dhammam deseti jinoti ādikam yam vacanam āha tena vacanena tesam

original: upanissayadhammapaccayadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvo saddahitabboti. “Yathāvutto padaṭṭhāno
analyzed: upanissaya dhamma paccaya dhammānam padaṭṭhāna bhāvo saddahitabbaḥ iti yathā vuttaḥ padaṭṭhānaḥ

original: hāro paripuṇṇo kiṃ, udāhu añño niddhāretvā yojetabbo atthi ki”nti vattabbattā “niyutto

original: moho ca natthi, so muni papañcādikaṃ sabbaṃ vītivatto atikkantoti vuccati. Nittaṇhaṃ

original: nimānaṃ nidiṭṭhiṃ nisandānaṃ nipalighaṃ loke carantaṃ taṃ muniṃ sadevako taṇhāsahito
analyzed: nimānam nidiṭṭhim nisandānam nipaligham loke carantam tam munim sa devakaḥ taṇhā sahitaḥ

original: loko na vijānātīti attho.
analyzed: lokaḥ na vijānāti iti attho

original: Gāthāyaṃ papañcādayo bhagavatā vuttā, “katame te”ti pucchitabbattā “papañcā nāmā”tiādi
analyzed: gāthā ayam papañca ādayaḥ bhagavatā vuttā katame te ti pucchitabbattā papañcāḥ nāma atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Attano ādhārapuggalaṃ saṃsāre ciraṃ papañcantāpentī taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiyo ca,
analyzed: vuttam attanaḥ ādhāra puggalam saṃsāre ciram taṇhā māna diṭṭhiyo ca

original: tāhi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi sahajātavasena vā upatthambhanavasena vā abhisaṅkhatā saṅkhārā

analyzed: nāma pavattamānāya taṇhāya yam pariyuṭṭhānam ca chattiṃsa taṇhāya jāliniyā yāni vicaritāni

original: ca vuttāni, idaṃ sabbaṃ attano ādhāraṃ puggalaṃ bandhanaṭṭhena sandānasadisattā sandānaṃ
analyzed: ca vuttāni idam sabbam attanaḥ ādhāram puggalam bandhana ṭṭhena sandāna sadisa ttā sandānam

original: nāma. Moho attano ādhārassa puggalassa nibbānanagarappavesanassa paṭisedhakattā palighasadisattā
analyzed: nāma mohaḥ attanaḥ ādhārassa puggalassa nibbāna nagara ppavesanassa paṭisedhaka ttā paligha sadisa ttā

original: yo muni samatikkanto, ayaṃ muni “nittaṇho”ti vuccatīti daṭṭhabbo.

original: Kā sā? Apadussanīyādīsu atidussanādivasena pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā. Upapajje

analyzed: yāya desanāya gāthāya vā phala nibbattakam saṅkhāram āha sā desanā gāthā vā katamena

analyzed: aparena aparam pubbena yujjati yujjanam eti sameti yathā gaṅgā udakam yamunā udakena

analyzed: yujjati iti vuttam hoti

original: ayonisomanasikārena ārabbha sattasantāne pavattaṃ taṇhācaritaṃ. Paṭisaṅkhānabalenāti

analyzed: yaḥ ayam pubba apara sandhi ācariyena vibhatto saḥ yam katividhaḥ ti pucchitabba ttā so

original: Sandhi ca nāma atthādayo muñcitvā añño sabhāvadhammo nāma natthi, atthādīnañca chaatthapadādīsu avarodhanato “atthasandhi chappadānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.

analyzed: anusayaḥ bahuvidhaḥ kasmai avijjā anusayo ti saddahitabbaḥ iti vattabbattā avijjā paccayā

analyzed: puggalo ce kālam kareyya evam sati ābhatam vatthu nikkhittam yathā evam niraye

original: nikkhitto. Taṃ kissa hetu? Bhikkhave assa puggalassa cittaṃ paduṭṭhaṃ padositaṃ hi

analyzed: pajānāmi iti etam attham bhagavā avoca tattha tasmin sutte etam paduṭṭha cittam

original: nirayaṃ so upapajjatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ iti evaṃ vuccati.

analyzed: idam suttam pi saṃkilesa bhāgiyam suttam nāma sappurisā tumhe dukkhassa jāti dukkha jarā dukkha byādhi dukkha maraṇa dukkha apāya dukkha

original: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yojanattho pākaṭo.

analyzed: dukkaram avīta rāgo ti idam suttam pi saṃkilesabhāgiyam suttam nāma suttatthaḥ aṭṭhakathāyam vitthārato vutto

original: uñchena piṇḍapātacaraṇavīriyena laddhena missakabhojanena yāpentaṃ nandaṃ kadā kāle
analyzed: uñchena piṇḍapāta caraṇa vīriyena laddhena missaka bhojanena yāpentam nandam kadā kāle

original: ahaṃ passeyyanti avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
analyzed: aham passeyyanti avoca ati yojanā idam suttam nibbedha bhāgiyam suttam

original: Gotama, kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā
analyzed: gotama kiṃsu katamam chetvā vadhitvā vadhantaḥ kodha pariḷāhena a paridayhamānaḥ hutvā

original: sukhaṃ seti sayati, kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso
analyzed: sukham seti sayati kiṃsu katamam chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodha vināsena vinaṭṭha domanasso

original: hutvā na socati, gotama, tvaṃ kissa ekadhammassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ rocesīti brāhmaṇo pucchati.
analyzed: hutvā na socati gotama tvam kissa ekadhammassa vadham vadhanam rocesi iti brāhmaṇaḥ pucchati

original: Brāhmaṇa, kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kodham kujjhanam chetvā vadhitvā vadhantaḥ kodha pariḷāhena a paridayhamānaḥ

original: hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati, kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena
analyzed: hutvā sukham seti sayati kodham kujjhanam chetvā vadhitvā vadhantaḥ kodha vināsena

original: vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati, visamūlassa visasadisassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtassa
analyzed: vinaṭṭha domanassaḥ hutvā na socati visa mūlassa visa sadisassa dukkhassa mūla bhūtassa

original: madhuraggassa madhurasaṅkhātassa sukhapariyosānassa kodhassa kujjhanassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ
analyzed: madhura aggassa madhura saṅkhātassa sukha pariyosānassa kodhassa kujjhanassa vadham vadhanam

original: ariyā buddhādayo puggalā pasaṃsanti. Hi saccaṃ taṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā
analyzed: ariyāḥ buddha ādayaḥ puggalā pasaṃsanti hi saccam tam kodham kujjhanam chetvā vadhitvā

original: vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā seti sayatīti yojanā. Madhuraggassāti
analyzed: vadhantaḥ kodha vināsena vinaṭṭha domanassaḥ hutvā sa iti sayati iti yojanā madhuraggassa ati

original: ca madhuraṃ cetasikasukhaṃ assādaaggaṃ pariyosānaṃ assa kodhassāti madhuraggoti samāso
analyzed: ca madhuram cetasika sukham pariyosānam assa kodhassa ati madhuraggaḥ iti samāsaḥ

original: veditabbo. Kujjhantassa hi akkositvā paribhāsitvā paharitvā pariyosāne cetasikasukhassādo
analyzed: veditabbaḥ kujjhantassa hi akkositvā paribhāsitvā paharitvā pariyosāne cetasika sukha ssādaḥ

original: uppajjatīti. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
analyzed: uppajjati iti idam suttam nibbedha bhāgiyam suttam

original: Gotama, hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ hane haneyya. Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ
analyzed: gotama hanantaḥ dhīraḥ uppatitam kiṃsu katamam hane haneyya vinodentaḥ dhīraḥ jātam

original: kiṃsu katamaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya. Pajahanto dhīro kiṃ ca katamaṃ pajahe pajaheyya.
analyzed: kim katamam vinodaye vinodayeyya pajahantaḥ kim ca katamam pajahe pajaheyya

original: Dhīrassa kissa dhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti devatā pucchati.
analyzed: dhīrassa kissa dhammassa abhisamayaḥ sukhaḥ ti devatā pucchati

original: Devaputta, hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ hane haneyya. Vinodento dhīro
analyzed: devaputta hanantaḥ dhīraḥ uppatitam kodham kujjhanam hane haneyya vinodentaḥ dhīraḥ

original: jātaṃ rāgaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya. Pajahanto dhīro avijjaṃ pajahe pajaheyya. Saccadhammassa
analyzed: jātam rāgam vinodaye vinodayeyya pajahantaḥ dhīraḥ avijjam pajahe pajaheyya sacca dhammassa

original: abhisamayo sukhoti bhagavā avocāti yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ.
analyzed: abhisamayaḥ sukho ti bhagavā avoca ati yojanā idam suttam nibbedha bhāgiyam suttam

original: 101. Bhagavā sattiyā omaṭṭho uparito yāva heṭṭhā viddho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ
analyzed: bhagavā sattiyā omaṭṭhaḥ uparitas yāva heṭṭhā viddhaḥ purisaḥ satti pahānāya vīriyam

original: ārabhati viya, agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ
analyzed: ārabhati viya agginā matthake ḍayhamānaḥ āditta siraḥ purisaḥ aggi nibbāpana atthāya vīriyam

original: ārabhati iva, evaṃ kāmarāgena ḍayhamāno bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya kāmarāgavikkhambhanāya

original: appamatto vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti devatā kathesi.
analyzed: appamattaḥ vā āyamamānaḥ sataḥ sati sampannaḥ hutvā paribbaje vihareyya iti devatā kathesi

original: Bhagavā pana “samucchedappahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhīyatī”ti dassetuṃ “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”tiādimāha.
analyzed: bhagavā pana samuccheda ppahānāya vīriyam ārabhīyati iti dassetum sattiyā viya omaṭṭhaḥ ti ādim āha

original: Devaputta, sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya, agginā matthake
analyzed: devaputta sattiyā omaṭṭhaḥ purisaḥ satti ppahānāya vīriyam ārabhati viya agginā matthake

original: ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva, evaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: ḍayhamānaḥ āditta siraḥ purisaḥ aggi nibbāpana atthāya vīriyam ārabhati iva evam sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā

original: abhibhūto bhikkhu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggena samucchedappahānāya appamatto
analyzed: abhibhūtaḥ bhikkhu sakkāya diṭṭhiyāḥ pahānāya maggena samuccheda ppahānāya appamattaḥ

original: vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
analyzed: vāyamamānaḥ sataḥ sati sampannaḥ hutvā paribbaje vihareyya iti bhagavā avoca ati yojanā

original: Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
analyzed: idam suttam nibbedhabhāgiyam suttam nāma

original: Sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā bhavanti, sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā
analyzed: sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khaya pariyosānā bhavanti sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā

original: patanapariyosānā bhavanti, sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ
analyzed: patana pariyosānāḥ bhavanti sabbesam sattānam maraṇam āgamma sabbesam sattānam jīvitam

original: addhuvaṃ bhavati, iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ
analyzed: addhuvam bhavati iti etam vutta ppakāram bhayam bhaya hetum maraṇam sammuti maraṇam

original: apekkhamāno paṇḍito sukhāvahāni diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasukhāvahāni puññāni dānasīlabhāvanāmayapuññāni
analyzed: apekkhamānaḥ paṇḍitaḥ sukha āvahāni diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika sukha āvahāni puññāni dāna sīla bhāvanā maya puññāni

original: kayirāthāti devatā avoca.
analyzed: kayirā athā ati devatāḥ avoca

original: Devaputta, sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā, sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā
analyzed: devaputta sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khaya pariyosānā sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā

original: patanapariyosānā, sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ,
analyzed: patana pariyosānā sabbesam sattānam maraṇam āgamma sabbesam sattānam jīvitam addhuvam

original: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ apekkhamāno santipekkho sabbasaṅkhārupasamaṃ
analyzed: iti etam vutta ppakāram bhayam bhaya hetum maraṇam apekkhamāno santipekkhaḥ sabba saṅkhāra upasamam

original: nibbānaṃ apekkhamāno paṇḍito lokāmisaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ pajahe pajaheyyāti bhagavā avocāti
analyzed: nibbānam apekkhamānaḥ paṇḍitaḥ loka amisam kāma guṇam pajahe pajaheyya iti bhagavā avoca ati

original: yojanā. Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
analyzed: yojanā idam suttam nibbedhabhāgiyam suttam nāma

original: Māvidha yesaṃ munīnaṃ cittaṃ jhānarataṃ jhāne rataṃ hoti, te munayo sukhaṃ sayanti
analyzed: yesam munīnam cittam jhāna ratam jhāne ratam hoti te munayaḥ sukham sayanti

original: na socanti. Paññavā maggapaññavā susamāhito āraddhavīriyo pahitatto nibbānaṃ pesitacitto
analyzed: na socanti paññavā magga paññavā su samāhitaḥ āraddha vīriyo pahita ttaḥ nibbānam pesita citto

original: puggalo duttaraṃ oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tarati.
analyzed: puggalaḥ duttaram ogham saṃsāra ogham tarati

original: Kāmasaññāya virato vigatacitto yo khīṇāsavo sabbasaṃyojanātīto arahattamaggena sabbe
analyzed: kāma saññāya virataḥ vigata cittaḥ yaḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ sabba saṃyojana atītaḥ arahatta maggena sabbe

original: saṃyojane atīto nandibhavaparikkhīṇo ahosi, so khīṇāsavo gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na
analyzed: saṃyojane atītaḥ nandi bhava parikkhīṇo ahosi saḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na

original: sīdatīti yojanā. Nandisaṅkhātā taṇhā ca kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavā ca nandibhavā,
analyzed: sīdati iti yojanā nandi saṅkhātā taṇhā ca kāma bhava rūpa bhava arūpa bhavā ca nandi bhavā

original: nandibhavā parikkhīṇā yassa khīṇāsavassāti nandibhavaparikkhīṇoti samāso veditabbo.
analyzed: nandi bhavā parikkhīṇā yassa khīṇa āsavassa ati nandi bhava parikkhīṇaḥ iti samāsaḥ veditabbo

original: Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
analyzed: idam suttam nibbedhabhāgiyam suttam nāma

original: Arahataṃ arahantānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ sucaritādibhedañca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedañca
analyzed: arahatam arahantānam buddha paccekabuddha sāvakānam dhammam su carita ādi bhedam ca sattatiṃsa bodhi pakkhiya bhedam ca

original: dhammaṃ yo paṇḍito saddahāno saddahanto hutvā nibbānappattiyā appamatto vicakkhaṇo
analyzed: dhammam yaḥ paṇḍitaḥ saddahānaḥ saddahantaḥ hutvā nibbāna ppattiyā appamattaḥ vicakkhaṇo

original: hutvā sussūsaṃ sussūsanto bhave, so paṇḍito paññaṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhate labhati.
analyzed: hutvā sussūsam sussūsantaḥ bhave saḥ paṇḍitaḥ paññam lokiya lokuttara paññam labhate labhati

original: Yo vīriyavā puggalo patirūpadesakārī desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyalokuttaradhammapatirūpaṃ

analyzed: adhigama upāyam karoti dhuravā cetasika vīriyena a nikkhitta dhuraḥ uṭṭhātā kāyika vīriya vasena

analyzed: uṭṭhāna sampannaḥ hoti saḥ vīriyavā puggalaḥ dhanam lokiya lokuttara dhanam vindate adhigacchati

original: Saccena vacīsaccena ca paramatthasaccena ca buddhādiko saccadhamme ṭhito sappuriso
analyzed: saccena vacī saccena ca paramattha saccena ca buddha ādikaḥ sacca dhamme ṭhitaḥ sappurisaḥ

original: kittiṃ pappoti. Dadaṃ dadanto yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ catusaṅgahavatthuṃ dadanto
analyzed: kittim pappoti dadam dadantaḥ yam kiñci icchitam patthitam catu saṅgaha vatthum dadantaḥ

original: saṅgahanto sappuriso mittāni ekantamittāni ganthati sampādeti, evaṃ catūhi saccadhammadhiticāgehi
analyzed: saṅga hantaḥ sappurisaḥ mittāni ekanta mittāni ganthati sampādeti evam catūhi sacca dhamma dhiti cāgehi

original: abhāvato na socatīti yojanā.
analyzed: abhāvataḥ na socati iti yojanā

analyzed: gotama sabba gantha ppahīnaḥ tīhi bhavehi vippamuttaḥ sataḥ sati sampannaḥ tvam samaṇaḥ

original: aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsasi yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karosi, taṃ anusāsanaṃ sabbaganthappahīnassa
analyzed: aññam deva manussa ādikam yam anusāsasi yam anusāsanam karosi tam anusāsanam sabba gantha ppahīnassa

original: tīhi bhavehi vippamuttassa samaṇassa te tava na sādhūti sakkanāmako mārapakkhiko
analyzed: tīhi bhavehi vippamuttassa samaṇassa te tava na sādhu iti sakka nāmakaḥ māra pakkhiko

original: yakkho gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
analyzed: yakkhaḥ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: “Sakka sakkanāmaka yakkha anukampitena purisena saddhiṃ yena kenaci vaṇṇena kāraṇena
analyzed: sakka sakka nāmaka yakkha anukampitena purisena saddhim yena kenaci vaṇṇena kāraṇena

original: saṃvāso ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sahavāso jāyati, taṃ anukampitabbaṃ sahavāsagataṃ purisaṃ sappañño
analyzed: saṃvāsaḥ ekasmin ṭhāne sahavāsaḥ jāyati tam anukampitabbam sahavāsa gatam purisam sappañño

original: manasā anukampituṃ na arahati anukampituṃyeva arahati. Yā anukampā karuṇā, yā anuddayā
analyzed: manasā anukampitum na arahati anukampitum yā iva arahati yā anukampā karuṇā yā anuddayā

analyzed: mettā muditā ca uppannā tāya anukampāya karuṇāya tāya anuddayāya mettāya muditāya

original: ca samussāhitena pasannena manasā yo sappañño sappuriso aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ
analyzed: ca samussāhitena pasannena manasā yaḥ sappaññaḥ sappuriso aññam deva manussa ādikam yaṃ

original: anusāsati yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karoti, so sappañño sappuriso tena anusāsanena saṃyutto
analyzed: anusāsati yam anusāsanam karoti so sappaññaḥ sappurisaḥ tena anusāsanena saṃyuttaḥ

analyzed: kāmacchanda ādīnam saṃyojanānam vasena ananuloma saṃyogena saṃyuttaḥ na hoti iti bhagavā avoca ati yojanā

original: 102. Samaṇa, rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā kutonidānā, kiṃnidānā, kiṃpaccayā bhavanti,
analyzed: rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā kutonidānā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayā bhavanti

original: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo kutojā kuto bhavanti? Kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ
analyzed: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo kutojāḥ kutas bhavanti kumārakāḥ

original: gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
analyzed: gahetvā pāde dīgha suttakena bandhitvā sutta koṭim aṅguliyam veṭhetvā osajanti iva

original: evaṃ manovitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajantīti sūcilomayakkho bhagavantaṃ pucchi.

original: Rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā itonidānā ito attabhāvato nidānā jāyanti; arati ca
analyzed: rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā itonidānā itas atta bhāvataḥ nidānā jāyanti ca

original: rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo itojā ito attato bhavanti; kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā

original: pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva, evaṃ manovitakkā
analyzed: pāde dīgha suttakena bandhitvā sutta koṭim aṅguliyam veṭhetvā osajanti iva evam manaḥ vitakkā

original: ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajanti.
analyzed: itas atta bhāvataḥ samuṭṭhāya cittam osajanti

original: Nigrodhassa khandhajā pārohā sākhāsu jāyanti iva, vane rukkhaṃ nissāya jātā māluvā
analyzed: nigrodhassa khandha jā pārohā sākhāsu jāyanti iva vane rukkham nissāya jātā māluvā

original: latā taṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vitatā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati iva, evaṃ, yakkha, tvaṃ
analyzed: latā tam rukkham ajjhottharitvā vitatā otata vitatā tiṭṭhati iva evam yakkha tvam

original: suṇohi snehajā taṇhāsnehato jātā attasambhūtā attani sambhūtā puna anekappakārā manovitakkā
analyzed: suṇohi sneha jā taṇhā snehataḥ jātā atta sambhūtā attani sambhūtā puna aneka ppakārā manaḥ vitakkā

original: pāpamanovitakkā ceva taṃsampayuttakilesā ca kāmesu vatthukāmesu visattā laggā saṃsibbitā ṭhitā.
analyzed: pāpa manaḥ vitakkā ca iva tad sampayutta kilesā ca kāmesu vatthu kāmesu visattā laggā saṃsibbitā ṭhitā

original: Ye paṇḍitā “yaṃ nidānaṃ assa attabhāvassā”ti yatonidānaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ
analyzed: ye paṇḍitāḥ yam nidānam assa atta bhāvassa ati yatonidānam naṃ kilesa gahanam samudaya saccam

original: samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti. Apunabbhavāya apunabhavasaṅkhātāya nirodhasaccatthāya
analyzed: samudaya saccam magga saccena vinodenti apunabbhavāya apunabhava saṅkhātāya nirodha saccatthāya

original: atiṇṇapubbaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre supinenāpi atiṇṇapubbaṃ duttaraṃ imaṃ oghaṃ catubbidhaṃ

original: sāsane, brahmavimāne vā pasannacittā hutvā namassanti. Nidhāti ca ettha na-kāro āgamo.
analyzed: sāsane brahmavimāne vā pasanna cittāḥ hutvā namassanti ca ettha nakāraḥ āgamaḥ

original: Purisājañña te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu, purisuttama te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu, yassa te tava nissayaṃ mayaṃ nābhijānāma, so tvaṃ kiṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jhāyasīti avocunti yojanā.
analyzed: purisa ajañña te tava amhākam namaḥ atthu purisuttama te tava amhākam namaḥ atthu yassa te tava nissayam mayam na abhijānāma saḥ tvam kim puggalam nissāya jhāyasi iti avocuḥ ti yojanā

original: Ye bhikkhū kālena kālaṃ dhammassavanavasena cirarattaṃ sametikā bhavanti, ime bhikkhū sahāyā honti vata. Nesaṃ sahāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamme buddhappavedite dhamme saddhammo sameti.
analyzed: ye bhikkhū kālena kālam dhamma ssavana vasena cira rattam sametikāḥ bhavanti ime bhikkhū sahāyāḥ honti vata nesam sahāyānam bhikkhūnam dhamme buddha ppavedite dhamme saddhammo sameti

original: Kappinena ariyappavedite dhamme suvinītā te sahāyakā bhikkhū savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhārentīti avocāti yojanā.
analyzed: kappinena ariya pavedite dhamme su vinītā te sahāyakāḥ bhikkhū sa vāhinim māram jetvā antimam deham atta bhāvam dhārenti iti avoca ati yojanā

original: Sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabbha sabbadukkhappamocanaṃ idaṃ nibbānaṃ yogāvacarena na adhigantabbaṃ, appena appakena thāmasā idaṃ nibbānaṃ na adhigantabbaṃ.
analyzed: sithilam vīriyam ārabbha sabba dukkha ppamocanam idam nibbānam yogāvacarena na adhigantabbam appena appakena thāmasā idam nibbānam na adhigantabbam

analyzed: ayam ca yogāvacaraḥ daharaḥ yaḥ puriso sa vāhinim māram jetvā antimam deham atta bhāvam

analyzed: mogha rāja dubbaṇṇakaḥ lūkha cīvaraḥ sadā sataḥ sati sampannaḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ ca visaṃyuttaḥ

analyzed: sa vāhinim māram jetvā antimam deham dhāra iti iti avoca ati yojanā

analyzed: vā tatiya ādimhi vā atta bhāve vipaccati bhasma channo chārikāya paṭicchanno pāvako

analyzed: ḍahāpentam hutvā na anveti dutiye vā tatiya ādimhi vā attabhāve apāya dukkha ādi nibbattāpana vasena

analyzed: hutvā ḍahantam tam bālam tam anveti iti yojanā idam na hipe

original: suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.

analyzed: ettakam eva lokiyanti vattabbattā cattārimāni itiādi vuttam atthaḥ pākaṭaḥ idam

analyzed: suttam lokiye atthe vācaka ñāpaka bhāvena

original: pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ lokiyam nāma

analyzed: evam duvidham yeva lokiyanti vattabbattā aṭṭhime bhikkhave loka dhammā tiādi vuttam

original: Attho pākaṭo. Idaṃ “aṭṭhime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiyesu aṭṭhavidhesu atthesu vācakañāpakabhāvena
analyzed: atthaḥ pākaṭaḥ idam aṭṭhima iti ādikam suttam lokiyesu aṭṭhavidhesu atthesu vācaka ñāpaka bhāvena

original: pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ lokiyam nāma

original: Nānāvidhaṃ lokiyaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ, amhehi ca ñātaṃ, “katamaṃ suttaṃ lokuttara”nti
analyzed: nānāvidham lokiyam ācariyena niddhāritam amhehi ca ñātam katamam suttam lokuttaran ti

original: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu suttesu.
analyzed: tattha iti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiya ādīsu suttesu

original: Chekena sārathinā sudantā assā samathaṅgatā yathā, evaṃ pahīnamānassa pahīnanavavidhamānassa
analyzed: chekena sārathinā su dantā assā samathaṅga tā yathā evam pahīna mānassa pahīna navavidha mānassa

original: Tādino tādilakkhaṇena samannāgatassa anāsavassa tassa bhikkhuno devāpi manussāpi

analyzed: pavattanataḥ lokuttaram nāma

original: “Ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “pañcimāni bhikkhave indriyānī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Idaṃ “pañcimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma. (1)

original: “Laddhāna mānusattaṃ dve, kiccaṃ akiccameva cā”tiādikā dve gāthā vuttā. Iha gāthāsu
analyzed: dve kiccam akiccam eva ca ati ādikāḥ dve gāthāḥ vuttāḥ iha gāthāsu

original: “sukiccaṃ ceva puññānī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “puññāni karitvāna, saggā saggaṃ vajanti
analyzed: su kiccam ca iva puññāni iti yam gāthā padam ca puññāni karitvāna saggā saggam vajanti

original: katapuññā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ, idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena
analyzed: yam gāthā padam ca vuttam idam gāthā padam lokiye atthe vācaka ñāpaka bhāvena

original: pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pavattanataḥ lokiyam nāma

original: Iha gāthāsu “saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “saṃyojanavippahānā, jarāmaraṇā

original: vippamuccantī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ, idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ vuttanayena lokuttaraṃ
analyzed: vippamuccanti iti yam gāthā padam ca vuttam idam gāthā padam vutta nayena lokuttaram

analyzed: nāma idam vutta ppakārena lokiyam ca lokuttaram ca

original: Bhikkhave, viññāṇe āhāre āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge sati nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
analyzed: bhikkhave viññāṇe āhāre āhāra paṭibaddhe chanda rāge sati nāma rūpassa avakkanti hoti

analyzed: viññāṇa īpe hoti iti idam vutta nayena lokiyam nāma viññāṇa īpe nirodho ti idam

original: suttaṃ lokuttaraṃ nāma. Idaṃ “viññāṇe ce bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiye atthe ca

original: 113. Sattaloke sabbā disā anuparigamma kvaci disāyaṃ cetasā attanā attato piyataraṃ
analyzed: satta loke sabbāḥ disāḥ anuparigamma kvaci disā ayam cetasā attanā attataḥ piyataram

analyzed: suttam sattesu vācaka ñāpaka bhāvena pavattanato satta adhiṭṭhānam nāma

analyzed: atta bhāvam pahāya nibbānam gamissanti ye ca puthujjana ādayaḥ sattā punabbhavesu bhavissanti

analyzed: vutta nayena satta adhiṭṭhānam

analyzed: katamehi sattahi parisuddha sīla sampatti parisuddha diṭṭhi sampattīhi samannāgata ttā

analyzed: piyaḥ ca piyāyitabbaḥ ca hoti pāsāṇa chattam viya garu ca hoti sambhāvetabba tāya bhāvanīyaḥ

analyzed: ca hoti kālena vadāmi no akālena ati ādike pañca dhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnam

original: vā sissānaṃ vā vinicchayaullumpanaovādadānabhāve ṭhatvā vattā ca hoti, sabrahmacārīhi
analyzed: vā sissānam vā vinicchaya aullumpana ovāda dāna bhāve vattā ca hoti sabrahmacārīhi

analyzed: vā aññam gambhīram vā katham kattā ca hoti dhamma vinaya ādi vasena iva dīpanataḥ aṭṭhāne

original: “Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
analyzed: piyaḥ garu bhāvanīyaḥ vattā ca vacana kkhamaḥ

analyzed: gambhīram ca katham kattā na ca ṭṭhāne niyojakaḥ

original: Taṃ mittaṃ mittakāmena, yāvajīvampi seviya”nti. –
analyzed: tam mittam mitta kāmena yāvajīvam

original: Etaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ satthā avocāti yojanā. “Na ca aṭṭhānayojako”ti pāṭho atthi. Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: etam gāthā vacanam satthā avoca ati yojanā na ca aṭṭhāna yojakaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ atthi idam sattahi iti ādikam vacanam satta adhiṭṭhānam

original: Loke yaṃ kāmasukhañca yaṃ idaṃ diviyaṃ sukhañca atthi, ete kāmasukhadiviyasukhā taṇhākkhayasukhassa

original: Tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ mātarañca, pitaraṃ nissāya mānassa

analyzed: yāti iti yojanā iha mātaranti ādi gāthā ayam mātaraṃpe hantvā iti idam gāthā vacanam

analyzed: dhamma adhiṭṭhānam anīghaḥ yāti brāhmaṇaḥ ti idam gāthā vacanam satta adhiṭṭhānam idam

analyzed: iddhipādehi samannāgataḥ puggalo kāye pi karaja kāye pi cittam pādaka jhāna cittam samodahati

analyzed: pakkhipati so puggalaḥ dissamāna kāyena gantu kāmo karaja kāya gatikam pādaka jjhāna cittam

original: Kāye karajakāye sukhasaññañca sukhavihārasaññañca lahusaññañca lahugamanasaññañca
analyzed: kāye karaja kāye sukha saññañca sukha vihāra saññañca lahu saññañca lahu gamana saññañca

analyzed: yam sabbaññuta ñāṇam lokuttaram lokam uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitam yena sabbaññuta ññāṇena

analyzed: iti saṃvaraṇa karaṇataḥ tam sīlam saṃvaram nāma pātimokkham eva saṃvaram pātimokkha saṃvaram

analyzed: pavattanataḥ anuññātam nāma

original: “Natthi puttasamaṃ pemaṃ, natthi gosamitaṃ dhanaṃ;

analyzed: paṭikkhitte atthe pavattanato ca paṭikkhittam nāma

original: “katamo suttaviseso thavo”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā ayaṃ suttaviseso thavo

original: nāmāti viññāpetuṃ “tattha katamo thavo”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu

original: lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamo suttaviseso thavo nāmāti pucchati.
analyzed: lokiya ādīsu sāsana paṭṭhāna suttesu katamaḥ sutta visesaḥ thavaḥ nāma ati pucchati

original: Maggānaṃ jaṅghamaggadiṭṭhimaggādīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko sammādiṭṭhimaggaṅgādiaṭṭhaṅgiko maggo

original: seṭṭho uttamo. Saccānaṃ vacīsaccakhattiyādisammutisaccaparamatthasaccānaṃ caturo

original: dukkhasamudayanirodhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāvasena caturo ariyasaccā padā seṭṭhā uttamā.

original: Dhammānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatasappaccayadhammānaṃ virāgo asaṅkhatanibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo

original: dhammo seṭṭho uttamo. Dvipadānaṃ sabbadevamanussādīnaṃ dvipadānaṃ cakkhumā pañcavidhacakkhumā
analyzed: dhammo seṭṭhaḥ uttamaḥ dvipadānam sabba deva manussa ādīnam dvipadānam cakkhumā pañcavidha cakkhumā

original: “Ayameva suttaviseso thavo”ti vattabbattā “tīṇimāni bhikkhave”tiādi vuttaṃ. Apadā

original: sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattā vā, asaññino asaññasattā vā, nevasaññīnāsaññino bhavagge

original: Āyasmatā mahākaccānena yā netti bhāsitā, bhagavatā sā netti anumoditā, mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ

original: saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi yā netti saṅgītā, sā netti “yaṃ loko pūjayate…pe… niyuttaṃ
analyzed: saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi yā na itti saṅgītā sā na itti yam lokaḥ

original: sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti ettāvatā vacanakkamena samattā paripuṇṇāva hoti.
analyzed: sāsana paṭṭhānam ti ettāvatā vacana kkamena samattā paripuṇṇā ava hoti

original: Iti samattāya āyasmatā mahākaccānena bhāsitāya bhagavatā anumoditāya mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ
analyzed: iti sa mattāya āyasmatā mahākaccānena bhāsitāya bhagavatā anumoditāya

original: saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi saṅgītāya nettiyā atthavaṇṇanā saddhammapālanāmena mahādhammarājagurunā
analyzed: saṅgāyantehi thera āsabhehi saṅgītāya nettiyā attha vaṇṇanā saddhammapāla nāmena mahā dhamma rāja gurunā

original: mahātherena racitā jinaputtānaṃ hitakarā nettivibhāvanā chabbīsādhikanavasate sakkarāje
analyzed: mahā therena racitā jinaputtānam hita karā netti vibhāvanā chabbīsa adhika nava sate sakka rāje

original: sāvaṇamāse sukkapakkhe navamadivase sūriyuggamanasamaye samattā.
analyzed: sāvaṇa māse sukka pakkhe navama divase sūri yuggamana samaye samattā

original: Iti sāsanapaṭṭhāne sattibalānurūpā racitā vibhāvanā
analyzed: iti sāsana paṭṭhāne satti bala anurūpā racitā vibhāvanā

original: Niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Sabbasattuttamo nātho, loke uppajji nāyako;
analyzed: sabba sattuttamaḥ nāthaḥ loke uppajji nāyakaḥ

original: Sambuddho gotamo jino, anekaguṇalaṅkato.
analyzed: sambuddhaḥ gotamaḥ jinaḥ aneka guṇa laṅkataḥ

original: Sāsanaṃ tassa seṭṭhassa, aṭṭhavassasatādhikaṃ;
analyzed: sāsanam tassa seṭṭhassa aṭṭha vassa sata adhikam

original: Dvisahassaṃ yadā pattaṃ, nimmalaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ subhaṃ.
analyzed: dvi sahassam yadā pattam nimmalam vaḍḍhanam subham

original: Tadā bhūmissaro mahādhammarājā mahiddhiko;
analyzed: tadā bhūmissaraḥ mahā dhamma rājā mahiddhikaḥ

original: Āṇācakkena sāreti, rājā noanuvattake.
analyzed: āṇācakkena sāreti rājā noanuvattake

original: Laddhā setagaje vare, loke vimhayajānake;
analyzed: laddhā setagaje vare loke vimhaya jānake

original: Appamatto mahāvīro, puññaṃ katvābhimodati.
analyzed: appamattaḥ mahāvīro puññam katvā abhimodati

original: Tasmiṃ vasseva sāvaṇe, māse navamadivase;
analyzed: tasmin vassā iva sāvaṇe māse navama divase

original: Sūriyuggamane kāle, nibbattāyaṃ vibhāvanā.
analyzed: sūri yuj gamane kāle nibbattā ayam vibhāvanā

original: Yattakaṃ sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ racitaṃ mayā;
analyzed: sa āsanam ṭhitam tattakam racitam mayā

original: Ṭhātu nettivibhāvanā, jinaputtahitāvahā.
analyzed: ṭhātu jinaputta hita āvahā

original: Iti taṃ racayantena, puññaṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
analyzed: iti tam racayantena puññam adhigatam mayā

original: Hontu tassānubhāvena, sabbe vimuttibhāgino.
analyzed: hontu tassa anubhāvena sabbe vimutti bhāginaḥ

original: Rājadevī puttanattā, panattā ca sajātikā;
analyzed: rājadevī puttanattā panattā ca sajātikā

original: Sabbe rajjasukhe ṭhatvā, carantu caritaṃ sukhī.
analyzed: sabbe rajja sukhe carantu caritam sukhī

original: Devo kāle suvassatu, sabbo raṭṭhajano sukhī;
analyzed: devaḥ kāle suvassatu sabbaḥ raṭṭha janaḥ sukhī

original: Aññamaññaṃ ahiṃsanto, piyo hotu hitāvahoti.
analyzed: aññam aññam a hiṃsantaḥ piyaḥ hotu hita āvahaḥ iti

original: Nettivibhāvinī niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā
